entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then showers beginning before morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Low 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 20 with temperature falling to 12 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. High 20 with temperature falling to 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
